info.title: Schema of ResourceNotifications events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the ResourceNotifications events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

ResourceNotificationsHealthResourcesAnno.description:
Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a
Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.HealthResources.ResourceAnnotated event.

ResourceNotificationsHealthResourcesAvai.description:
Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a
Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.HealthResources.AvailabilityStatusChanged
event.

resourceEventTime.description: Date and Time when resource was updated

ResourceNotificationsResourceDeletedDeta.description:
Describes the schema of the properties under resource info which are common
across all ARN system topic delete events

id.description: id of the resource for which the event is being emitted

name.description: name of the resource for which the event is being emitted

type.description: the type of the resource for which the event is being emitted

ResourceNotificationsResourceDeletedEven.description:
Describes the schema of the common properties across all ARN system topic
delete events

ResourceNotificationsResourceManagementC.description:
Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a
Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.Resources.CreatedOrUpdated event.

ResourceNotificationsResourceManagementD.description:
Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a
Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.Resources.Deleted event.

ResourceNotificationsResourceUpdatedDeta.description:
Describes the schema of the properties under resource info which are common
across all ARN system topic events

id.description: id of the resource for which the event is being emitted

name.description: name of the resource for which the event is being emitted

type.description: the type of the resource for which the event is being emitted

location.description: the location of the resource for which the event is being emitted

tags.description: the tags on the resource for which the event is being emitted

properties.description: properties in the payload of the resource for which the event is being emitted

ResourceNotificationsResourceUpdatedEven.description: Describes the schema of the common properties across all ARN system topic events

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource properties bag
